package.name: llvm
package.unpack: tar xf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz mkdir ${PKGNAME}-build cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src tar -xf ${SRCDIR}/cfe-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz -C tools tar -xf ${SRCDIR}/compiler-rt-${PKGVERSION}.src.tar.xz -C projects mv tools/cfe-${PKGVERSION}.src tools/clang mv projects/compiler-rt-${PKGVERSION}.src projects/compiler-rt cd ..
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src # sed -e 's:/docs/llvm:/share/doc/llvm:' -i Makefile.config.in cd ../${PKGNAME}-build if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 4 ` CC='distcc gcc' \ CXX='distcc g++' \ cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -DLLVM_ENABLE_FFI=ON \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DLLVM_BUILD_LLVM_DYLIB=ON \ -DLLVM_LINK_LLVM_DYLIB=ON \ -DLLVM_BUILD_TESTS=ON \ -DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD="host;AMDGPU;ARM;AArch64;X86" \ -Wno-dev ../${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src make -j $jobcount else CC='gcc' \ CXX='g++' \ cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -DLLVM_ENABLE_FFI=ON \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DLLVM_BUILD_LLVM_DYLIB=ON \ -DLLVM_LINK_LLVM_DYLIB=ON \ -DLLVM_BUILD_TESTS=ON \ -DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD="host;AMDGPU;ARM;AArch64;X86" \ -Wno-dev ../${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.src make -j 4 fi
